author: 0x1dea
content:
<@!498009160982724610> good point , but I actually wonder in general if all those new gossip 1.1 parameters (many of them!)  have been discussed in the eth2 perspective yet... 
Specially given that the spec explicitly asks for it:

> Because many parameters are inter-related and may be application-specific, reasonable defaults are not shown here

author: 0x1dea
content: or if that is up to the clients to optimize... (might use some genetic algo/annealing/ML)
